¶ 13 A new topic: an individual’s inauthentic historicity
A. Both authentic and inauthentic Dasein are historical
1. Because our very being is historical, even inauthentic existence is historical.
B. The need to study inauthentic historicity
2. Inauthentic historicity SZ has guided the inquiry into life’s connectedness and blocked access to authentic historicity and to how it functions in the connectedness of life.
3. Therefore, a complete study of historicity requires that we study inauthentic historicity.
